q0.title: What is a good use case for using a function while rendering a dynamic list of items ?

q0a.label: If we need to compute a value based on properties of items in the loop.

q0b.label: None. Functions should not be used while rendering a dynamic list.

q1.title: What is the second argument for setState useful for ?

q1a.label: To invoke code after the setState operation is done

q1b.label: To replace the state completely instead of the default merge action

q1c.label: To access the previous state before the setState operation
